name: Rodriguez cigar Lounge Domino Tournament
long_description:
Dominos Tournament 8-11pm (all prize details on flyer) Live DJ, ladies first drink is free, Pilar Rum Specials (sponsored by Rodriguez Cigars)

 

TOURNAMENT PRIZES

 

First Place Team Total

One Night Stay At Gates Hotel South Beach

2 Miami Heat Tickets Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Including Facial Scrub Package and Hot Towel Shave from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio

5 Pack Of Cigars

 

Second Place Team Total 

Full Day Boat Rental from Paradise Boat Rental

Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio

5 Pack of Cigars

 

Third Place Team Total

Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub From Imjuscuttin Barber Studio

2 Bottles Of Pilar Rum

5 Pack of Cigars

Gates Beach Towels
